SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Interface ControllerRemoteInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller
public interface ControllerRemoteInterface extends Remote
The ControllerRemoteInterface interface represents the remote interface of the controller.

  • Method Details

    • choosePlayerId

      void choosePlayerId(String playerId) throws RemoteException, PlayerIdAlreadyInUseException, PlayerOnlineException
      Chooses the player ID for a new player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
      PlayerIdAlreadyInUseException - If the player ID is already in use.
      PlayerOnlineException - If the player is already online.

    • addPlayerToCreatedGame

      int addPlayerToCreatedGame(Observer observer, String playerID) throws RemoteException, CreateNewGameException, AlreadyStartedGameException
      Adds a player to a created game.
      Parameters:
      observer - The observer object to be registered for updates.
      playerID - The ID of the player.
      Returns:
      The ID of the game the player was added to.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
      CreateNewGameException - If a new game cannot be created.
      AlreadyStartedGameException - If the game has already started.

    • createNewGameAndAddPlayer

      int createNewGameAndAddPlayer(String playerID, int maxPlayers) throws RemoteException, MaxNumberOfPlayersException, IOException, AlreadyStartedGameException, GameAlreadyCreatedException
      Creates a new game and adds a player to it.
      Parameters:
      playerID - The ID of the player.
      maxPlayers - The maximum number of players allowed in the game.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly created game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
      MaxNumberOfPlayersException - If the maximum number of players is exceeded.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while creating the game.
      AlreadyStartedGameException - If a game has already been started.
      GameAlreadyCreatedException - If a game has already been created.

    • pickAndInsertInBookshelf

      void pickAndInsertInBookshelf(ArrayList<Coordinates> tilesSelection, int column, int[] order, String playerId) throws PlayerIsWaitingException, SelectionIsEmptyException, SelectionNotValidException, ColumnNotValidException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException, TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException, VoidBoardTileException, WrongConfigurationException, RemoteException
      Picks and inserts tiles into the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      tilesSelection - The coordinates of the tiles to be picked.
      column - The column index where the tiles will be inserted.
      order - The order of the tiles to be picked.
      playerId - The ID of the player performing the action.
      Throws:
      PlayerIsWaitingException - If the player is currently waiting.
      SelectionIsEmptyException - If the selection of tiles is empty.
      SelectionNotValidException - If the selection of tiles is not valid.
      ColumnNotValidException - If the column index is not valid.
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - If the picked column is out of bounds.
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - If the picked tiles do not fit into the column.
      TilesSelectionSizeDifferentFromOrderLengthException - If the size of the tiles selection is different from the length of the order array.
      VoidBoardTileException - If a board tile is void.
      WrongConfigurationException - If the game configuration is incorrect.
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.

    • fillCompletely

      void fillCompletely() throws RemoteException, PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException, PickDoesntFitColumnException
      Fills the board completely.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
      PickedColumnOutOfBoundsException - If the picked column is out of bounds.
      PickDoesntFitColumnException - If the picked tiles do not fit into the column.

    • checkPassword

      void checkPassword(String playerId, String password, Observer observer) throws WrongPasswordException, RemoteException, AlreadyStartedGameException
      Checks the password for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player.
      password - The password to be checked.
      observer - The observer object to be registered for updates.
      Throws:
      WrongPasswordException - If the password is incorrect.
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
      AlreadyStartedGameException - If a game has already been started.

    • choosePassword

      void choosePassword(String playerId, String password) throws RemoteException, PlayerIdAlreadyInUseException
      Chooses the password for a player.
      Parameters:
      playerId - The ID of the player.
      password - The password to be set.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
      PlayerIdAlreadyInUseException - If the player ID is already in use.

    • ping

      void ping() throws RemoteException
      ping
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a communication-related error occurs.
